title: Audiophile
description: Audiophile is a website designed for online earphones, earbuds and speaker shopping.This website makes shopping more interactive and gives it a sense of moderness and technology.

title: Delicious App
description: This app uses the Recipe API to provide detailed recipe infomation like instructions and ingredients. It also has filter  option for different cuisines like Italian, American, Thai and Japannese cuisine and also allows random recipe search.

title: Todo List App
description: Todo List App is a simple yet amazing looking UI animated JavaScript app that uses local storage to store todo items. Make every hour of your day count with this simple Todo List App. You can keep track of all important appointments during a normal 9-5 work day!

title: Room
description: Room is a furniture and life style landing page designed with ReactJS. It shows main products with description that allows customer to make quick decision.

title: NASIMS Clone
description: This is replica of existing National Social Investment Management System (NASIMS) website design and content. This was achieved using HTML, CSS and Bootstrap

title: Countdown Timer
description: Countdown Timer is a javaScript timer and reminder for the important events & dates in your life. You can keep track of all important appointments, events or day

title: Guess My Number
description: Guess My Number is based on the fundamentals of JavaScript. Where you have 10 chances to guess a random number. The remaining chance will determine the score at the end. The user's highest score is saved.

title: Meet Landing Page
description: Meet is a social app landing page designed with React that can be use for booking meetings with your business partners and friends, as well as save personal notes.
